bibl.title: Recent Work on Ancient Magic.
bibl.note: First published in Spanish in: IDEM, Arcana mundi. Translated by Elena GALLEGO MOYA and Miguel E. PÉREZ MOLINA (Madrid, 1995) pp. 9-28. - Refers to Graeco-Roman Egypt and to magical papyri.
bibl.seg: LUCK Georg, Recent Work on Ancient Magic.
Georg LUCK, Ancient Pathways and Hidden Pursuits. Religion, Morals, and Magic in the Ancient World (Ann Arbor, 2000) pp. 203-222.
First published in Spanish in: IDEM, Arcana mundi. Translated by Elena GALLEGO MOYA and Miguel E. PÉREZ MOLINA (Madrid, 1995) pp. 9-28. - Refers to Graeco-Roman Egypt and to magical papyri.
